posting_times.evidence: Industry research (Hootsuite, Buffer 2025): 9 AM, 12 PM, 6 PM EST are peak Reels engagement windows

visual_style.current_best: lifelike cinematic scenes, medium shots, one camera movement per shot, 2-3 second scene cuts, no text or overlays in generated video
visual_style.color_trends: warm natural lighting, golden hour tones, high contrast with cinematic color grading
visual_style.hook_style: visual pattern interrupt or sudden movement into frame in first 2 seconds, no text hooks â€” purely visual curiosity gap
visual_style.ai_generation_notes: Generate a single ~25s video. Use medium shots to avoid uncanny close-ups. Specify one camera move per shot (dolly, pan, rack focus). Describe actions in beats. Add negative prompts: no text, no watermarks, no signs with writing. Specify ambient sounds for immersion.
